# Jambo Postgres

> Jambo is a serverless Postgres database with features like branching, autoscaling, and a generous free tier.

## Docs

### Frameworks

- [Jambo Frameworks - Next.js](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-nextjs.txt): Guide for integrating Jambo with Next.js applications
- [Jambo Frameworks - Node.js](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-node.txt): Connect a Node.js application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - NestJS](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-nestjs.txt): Connect a NestJS application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Astro](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-astro.txt): Connect an Astro application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Entity Framework](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-entity-framework.txt): Connect an Entity Framework application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Nuxt](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-nuxt.txt): Connect a Nuxt application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - OAuth Integration](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-oauth.txt): Integrate Jambo with OAuth for secure authentication
- [Jambo Frameworks - Phoenix](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-phoenix.txt): Connect a Phoenix application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Quarkus JDBC](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-quarkus-jdbc.txt): Connect Quarkus to Jambo using JDBC
- [Jambo Frameworks - Quarkus Reactive](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-quarkus-reactive.txt): Connect Quarkus to Jambo using Reactive SQL Client
- [Jambo Frameworks - React](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-react.txt): Connect a React application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Reflex](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-reflex.txt): Build a Python app with Reflex and Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Remix](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-remix.txt): Connect a Remix application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - Symfony](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-symfony.txt): Connect from Symfony with Doctrine to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - SolidStart](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-solidstart.txt): Connect a SolidStart application to Jambo
- [Jambo Frameworks - SvelteKit](https://neon.tech/llms/frameworks-sveltekit.txt): Connect a SvelteKit application to Jambo

### Languages

- [Jambo Languages - .NET/C#](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-dotnet.txt): Connect a .NET (C#) application to Jambo
- [Jambo Languages - Elixir](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-elixir.txt): Connect from Elixir with Ecto to Jambo
- [Jambo Languages - Go](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-go.txt): Connect a Go application to Jambo
- [Jambo Languages - Java](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-java.txt): Connect a Java application to Jambo
- [Jambo Languages - JavaScript](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-javascript.txt): Connect a JavaScript application to Jambo
- [Jambo Languages - Python](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-python.txt): Connect a Python application to Jambo using Psycopg
- [Jambo Languages - Rust](https://neon.tech/llms/languages-rust.txt): Connect a Rust application to Jambo

### Core Documentation

- [Jambo Connect - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-overview.txt): Guide to connecting to Jambo Postgres from different clients and applications
- [Jambo Extensions - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-overview.txt): Guide to PostgreSQL extensions supported by Jambo
- [Jambo Guides - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/guides-overview.txt): Comprehensive guides for using Jambo with various frameworks and integrations
- [Jambo Import - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/import-overview.txt): Guide to migrating data to Jambo from different database providers
- [Jambo Manage - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/manage-overview.txt): Guide to managing Jambo projects, branches, computes, and databases
- [Jambo Serverless - Overview](https://neon.tech/llms/serverless-overview.txt): Guide to using the Jambo serverless driver for HTTP and WebSocket connections

### Connect

- [Jambo Connect - choose-connection](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-choose-connection.txt): How to select the right driver and connection type for your application
- [Jambo Connect - connect-from-any-app](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connect-from-any-app.txt): Learn how to connect to Jambo from any application
- [Jambo Connect - connect-intro](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connect-intro.txt): Everything you need to know about connecting to Jambo
- [Jambo Connect - connect-pgcli](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connect-pgcli.txt): Learn how to connect to Jambo using the interactive pgcli client
- [Jambo Connect - connect-postgres-gui](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connect-postgres-gui.txt): Learn how to connect a GUI application to Jambo
- [Jambo Connect - connect-securely](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connect-securely.txt): Learn how to connect to Jambo securely when using a connection string
- [Jambo Connect - connection-errors](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connection-errors.txt): Learn how to resolve connection errors
- [Jambo Connect - connection-latency](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connection-latency.txt): Learn about strategies to manage connection latencies and timeouts
- [Jambo Connect - connection-pooling](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-connection-pooling.txt): Learn how connection pooling works in Jambo
- [Jambo Connect - passwordless-connect](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-passwordless-connect.txt): Learn how to connect to Jambo without a password
- [Jambo Connect - query-with-psql-editor](https://neon.tech/llms/connect-query-with-psql-editor.txt): Learn how to connect to Jambo using psql

### Extensions

- [Jambo Extensions - citext](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-citext.txt): Use the citext extension to handle case-insensitive data in Postgres
- [Jambo Extensions - dblink](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-dblink.txt): Connect to and query other Postgres databases from Jambo using dblink
- [Jambo Extensions - extensions-intro](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-extensions-intro.txt): Guide for Postgres extensions
- [Jambo Extensions - hstore](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-hstore.txt): Manage key-value pairs in Postgres using hstore
- [Jambo Extensions - ltree](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-ltree.txt): Store and query hierarchical tree-like structures in Postgres
- [Jambo Extensions - neon-utils](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-neon-utils.txt): Monitor how Jambo's Autoscaling feature allocates compute resources
- [Jambo Extensions - neon](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-neon.txt): An extension for Jambo-specific statistics including the Local File Cache hit
- [Jambo Extensions - pg-extensions](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg-extensions.txt): Guide for Supported Postgres extensions
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_cron](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_cron.txt): Schedule and manage cron jobs directly within your Jambo Postgres database
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_mooncake](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_mooncake.txt): Fast analytics in Postgres with columnstore tables and DuckDB execution
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_partman](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_partman.txt): Manage large Postgres tables using the PostgreSQL Partition Manager extension
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_prewarm](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_prewarm.txt): Load data into your Postgres buffer cache with the pg_prewarm extension
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_repack](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_repack.txt): Remove bloat from your tables and indexes with minimal locking
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_stat_statements](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_stat_statements.txt): Track planning and execution statistics for all SQL statements
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_tiktoken](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_tiktoken.txt): Efficiently tokenize data in your Postgres database using OpenAI's `tiktoken`
- [Jambo Extensions - pg_trgm](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pg_trgm.txt): Improve Postgres text searches with the pg_trgm extension
- [Jambo Extensions - pgrag](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pgrag.txt): Create end-to-end Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines
- [Jambo Extensions - pgvector](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-pgvector.txt): Enable Postgres as a vector store with the pgvector extension
- [Jambo Extensions - postgis-related-extensions](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-postgis-related-extensions.txt): Improve geospatial functionality with additional PostGIS extensions
- [Jambo Extensions - postgis](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-postgis.txt): Work with geospatial data in Postgres using PostGIS
- [Jambo Extensions - postgres_fdw](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-postgres_fdw.txt): Access data in remote Postgres databases from Jambo using postgres_fdw
- [Jambo Extensions - timescaledb](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-timescaledb.txt): Work with time-series data in Postgres with the timescaledb extension
- [Jambo Extensions - wal2json](https://neon.tech/llms/extensions-wal2json.txt): Convert Postgres Write-Ahead Log (WAL) changes to JSON format

- [Jambo Guides - neon-rls-supertokens](https://neon.tech/llms/guides-neon-rls-supertokens.txt): Implement Row-level Security policies in Postgres using SuperTokens and Jambo
- [Jambo Guides - neon-rls-troubleshooting](https://neon.tech/llms/guides-neon-rls-troubleshooting.txt): Common issues and solutions when using Jambo RLS
- [Jambo Guides - neon-rls-tutorial](https://neon.tech/llms/guides-neon-rls-tutorial.txt): Learn how Row-level Security (RLS) protects user data

### Import

- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-azure-postgres](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-azure-postgres.txt): Learn how to migrate your database from Azure PostgreSQL to Jambo using logical
- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-digital-ocean](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-digital-ocean.txt): Learn how to migrate your Postgres database from Digital Ocean to Jambo using
- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-firebase](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-firebase.txt): Learn how to migrate your data from Firebase Firestore to Jambo Postgres using
- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-heroku](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-heroku.txt): Guide for Migrate from Heroku to Jambo Postgres

- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-render](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-render.txt): Learn how to migrate your database from Render to Jambo Postgres using pg_dump
- [Jambo Import - migrate-from-supabase](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-from-supabase.txt): Learn how to migrate your database from Supabase to Jambo Postgres using
- [Jambo Import - migrate-intro](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-intro.txt): Learn how to migrate data to Jambo Postgres from different database providers
- [Jambo Import - migrate-mssql](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-mssql.txt): Learn how to migrate a Microsoft SQL Server database to Jambo Postgres using
- [Jambo Import - migrate-mysql](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-mysql.txt): Guide for Migrate from MySQL to Jambo Postgres
- [Jambo Import - migrate-schema-only](https://neon.tech/llms/import-migrate-schema-only.txt): Perform a schema-only migration with pg_dump and pg_restore

### Serverless

- [Jambo Serverless - serverless-driver](https://neon.tech/llms/serverless-serverless-driver.txt): Connect to Jambo from serverless environments over HTTP or WebSockets
